channel.title: Help please.. 317 Delta
channel.description:
1. *The Prayer on my server drains too fast.. very fast..
2. *The Dark Bow Special is weird.. (when you special, a barrage animation comes onto you and you shoot 2 bunnies..) rofl.
3. *The weapon special comes back too fast..
4. *A dds special takes up 100%..
5. *And im trying to make it so this shop buys barrows for a lot of $. But idk how to change it.

item.title: Help please.. 317 Delta
item.dc:creator: @Praktikanten Praktikanten
item.description:
@Praktikanten wrote:

2. You’ll have to change the gfx and the animation.

3.
Seach your client.java for and you if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastSpecial should find a code like this:

if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastSpecial > 50000 && specialAmount < 100){ specialAmount += 25; lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); specAttack(); }

Change the time (in my example it’s the 50000) to change how long it takes to get new special power or change the amout of special power the player gains.

4. check this tutorial http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,427703.msg3140810.html#msg3140810 under 3.Special Attacks

5. Seach for the name of barrow equipment in Item.cfg and change the shop price of them (first integer).

Hope I helped somewhat

Read full topic
